name.text: Open Research Conversation: Affordable Access and Publishing

node.summary: This event will include talks and discussions about how to make scholarly publishing affordable for both readers and authors.

name.text: Open Research Conversation: Electronic Lab Notebooks

node.summary: This event will include talks and discussions about the use of electronic lab notebooks in the research process and beyond.

name.text: Open Research Conversation: Sharing Qualitative Data Ethically

node.summary: This joint event with the University Research Ethics Committee will include talks and discussions about ethically sharing qualitative data.

name.text: Open Research Conversation: Reproducibility in Practice

node.summary: Join us for a discussion on the importance of reproducibility and the challenges faced when attempting to reproduce others' research.

name.text: Lunch bytes #4: Data Visualisation - RSE Sheffield

node.summary: At this LunchBytes event weâ€™ll be exploring static and interactive data visualisation via some short talks.

name.text: Open Research Conversation: Unpacking Open Monographs

node.summary: Join us for a discussion about the opportunities and challenges in making monographs openly available.

name.text: Open Research Conversation: Visualising CoVid-19 Data

node.summary: Join us for a conversation about researchers' experiences of visualising CoVid-19 data and the impact these are having on policy and society

name.text: Open Research Conversation: Open Research with the Wellcome Trust

node.summary: Join us for an online discussion of the Wellcome Trust's new Open Access policy, with Hannah Hope from the Wellcome Trust

frontmatter.title: Urban Observatories hackathon
frontmatter.description: The University of Sheffield hosted a three-day hackathon aimed to begin tackling the complex challenges involved in coordinating analytics using data from urban observatories across the UK.
